INDIA BEATS AUSTRALIA IN GABBA

Rishabh Pant leads record-breaking chase as India beat Australia to fourth Test and series. A freewheeling Rishabh Pant has stormed Australia's Gabba fortress in record-breaking fashion, helping India snatch a three-wicket win to cap one of the greatest Test series of the modern era. A freewheeling Rishabh Pant has stormed.
